mapper.insert: insert into member(member_num, snsid, userid, username, phone1,phone2,phone3) values(seq_member_num.nextval, #{snsid},#{userid},#{username},#{phone1},#{phone2},#{phone3})

insert into member(member_num,userid, passwd, username, phone1,phone2,phone3, post1,post2, addr1, addr2, email) values(seq_member_num.nextval,#{userid},#{passwd},#{username},#{phone1},#{phone2},#{phone3},#{post1},#{post2},#{addr1},#{addr2},#{email})
mapper.select: select userid from member where userid=#{userid}
select email from member where email=#{email}
